[[File:Bag Water Egg Sprite.png|thumb|300px|The Water Egg]] ==Details== A '''Water Egg''' is a type of [[Egg]] that can hatch Water-type Pokémon. ===Hatch Table=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Kanto !! Johto !! Hoenn !! Sinnoh !! Unova !! Kalos |- | Squirtle || | Totodile || Mudkip || Piplup || Oshawott || Froakie |- | Lapras || | Wooper || Feebas || Finneon || Panpour || |- | Staryu || | Marill || Clamperl || Buizel || || |- | Psyduck || | Qwilfish || || || || |} ===Acquisition=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Location !! Price |- | [[Shops#Kanto:_Locations_and_items|Cerulean City]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[Shops#Johto:_Locations_and_items|Olivine City]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[Shops#Hoenn:_Locations_and_items|Slateport City]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[Shops#Sinnoh:_Locations_and_items|Pastoria City]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[Shops#Unova:_Locations_and_items|Castelia City]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[Shops#Kalos:_Locations_and_items|Ambrette Town]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |} {{Eggs}}
